prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FoodForThought 
Title: The Evolution of Veganism: Health, Ethics, and Environment 
Description: Dive deep into the journey of veganism from its ancient roots to its modern day implications. Understand the health benefits, ethical dilemmas, and environmental impacts of a plant-based diet.
Not at all

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SportsGlobe 
Title: The Rise and Fall of Chess Boxing: A Unique Fusion of Brain and Brawn 
Description: Explore the intriguing world of chess boxing - a hybrid sport that tests both mental agility and physical toughness. Delve into its origin, popularity peaks, recent decline, and the potential it holds for a compelling comeback.
No, sounds boring

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TheArtistryLounge 
Title: The Renaissance of 80's Pop Culture: A Nostalgic Revival 
Description: Take a trip down memory lane into the vibrant world of the 1980s. Uncover how its pop culture is experiencing a revival in today's fashion, music, and entertainment scene, and how it's influencing the younger generation.
Not really, it's not a topic that interests me

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: ScienceScape
Title: The Hunting Patterns of the Nebula Jellyfish: A Glimpse into the Deep Sea
Description: Delve into the mysterious and captivating world of the deep sea through the lens of the nebula jellyfish. Learn about their unique hunting patterns, evolutionary strategies and the critical role they play in maintaining the underwater ecosystem.
Sure, might be worth looking at

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: PoliticalPulse 
Title: Analyzing the Impact of the 2022 Midterm Elections on International Relations 
Description: Explore the profound effects of the recent 2022 Midterm Elections on the U.S.'s international relations. Understand how the shifts in power dynamics within the U.S. are impacting its relationships with geopolitical allies and rivals, and what this could mean for global stability.
Boring!

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: AdventureChronicles 
Title: The Vanishing Tribes of the Amazon: A Journey into the Unknown 
Description: Join us in an unexplored journey to the heart of the Amazon, where we delve into the lives, cultures, and challenges of the disappearing indigenous tribes. Engage with the environmental and societal factors pushing them to the brink of extinction and the global efforts to preserve their heritage.
No, it doesn't pique my interest.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: MindfulLiving
Title: "Achieving Inner Peace: A Step-by-Step Guide to Meditation and Mindfulness"
Description: This comprehensive guide will take you on a journey to achieve true inner peace. Learn the basics of meditation, explore the principles of mindfulness, and discover the science-backed benefits of a regular practice. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced practitioner, this article offers tools and techniques to enhance your daily routine and overall well-being.
No thank you.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTimes
Title: Virtual Reality: The Impending Future of Gaming, Medicine, and Education
Description: Get a glimpse into the future where virtual reality is not just about gaming but also spills over into medical procedures, education, and training. This article explores the potential applications and the transformative impact virtual reality could have on these sectors.
Yes, that sounds really interesting to me.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SpaceVoyager
Title: An Expansive Guide to Space Tourism: Are Starry Holidays the Future?
Description: Embark on an interstellar journey through the emerging field of space tourism. This article explores the technological advancements, safety measures, and economic implications of commercial space travel. Are we on the brink of vacationing among the stars? Understand the realities and fantasies of what could be the next giant leap for mankind.
Kinda, could be good

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: HistoricalHubs
Title: The Great Silk Road: Trade, Culture, and Conflict in the Ancient World
Description: This article takes you on a historical journey through the famed Silk Road, a network of trade routes that shaped economic, cultural, and political relations among diverse civilizations. Discover the goods, ideas, and technologies that were exchanged, the conflicts that ensued, and the enduring impact of these interactions on the modern world. How did the Silk Road alter the course of history, and what lessons can we learn from this ancient globalization?
Yeah why not

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CryptoCurrency101 
Title: Understanding Blockchain and its Impact on Society 
Description: This article explains the basics of blockchain technology, its potential applications, and how it is transforming various sectors from finance to healthcare. Venture beyond the typical association of blockchain with cryptocurrencies, and explore its potential to bring about transparency, security, and decentralization in numerous aspects of society.
Nope, not for me.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: HomeDecorInsight
Title: Small Spaces, Big Impact: Creative Design Ideas for Minimalist Living
Description: This article offers a wealth of creative, practical solutions for small living spaces. From multi-functional furniture arrangements to innovative storage solutions, discover how to make the most out of minimal square footage. Get inspired to create a beautiful, efficient, and comfortable home without the need for excess.
Not interested.

Description: This article provides a comprehensive analysis of the electric vehicle revolution. It explores the role Tesla has played in this transformation, the challenges faced in the industry, and the potential future of the automotive world. From issues of charging infrastructure to environmental implications, this article covers it all.
Not interested at all.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: LinguisticsWorld
Title: The Evolution of Language: Unraveling the Mysteries of Our Most Human Trait 
Description: This article delves into the fascinating world of language evolution. Explore the origins of language, tracing back to the earliest human societies, and follow its dynamic evolution over millennia. Understand the role language plays in shaping our cultures and identities, and ponder the future of language in an increasingly digital world.
Yes, that sounds interesting.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: BiorhythmDigest 
Title: The Human Body Clock: Exploring Chronobiology and Its Impacts on Health 
Description: This article delves into the fascinating science of chronobiology, the study of biological rhythms. Learn about the internal body clock and how it governs a multitude of physiological processes. Understand the impacts of disrupting these rhythms on physical and mental health, and explore strategies to optimize your own biological rhythms for enhanced well-being.
Maybe, I'd prefer something else.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: QuantumQuirks
Title: Quantum Computing: The Paradigm Shift in Next-Gen Technology
Description: This article takes a deep dive into the intricate world of quantum computing. Grasp the fundamentals of quantum mechanics and how they're being harnessed to build unimaginably powerful computers. Understand the potential these machines hold for solving problems beyond the reach of classical computers and how they might redefine our technological landscape in the near future.
Sure, that sounds good.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: MusicMosaic
Title: Exploring the Healing Power of Music Therapy: From Neuroscience to Practical Applications
Description: This article dives into the healing potential of music therapy, drawing from latest neuroscience research and clinical case studies. Understand how music impacts our brain, emotions, and body, and explore its therapeutic applications across various populations - from children with autism, to Alzheimer's patients, to those dealing with mental health issues. Get insights into the process of a music therapy session, its benefits, potential challenges, and future advancements in the field.
Kind of, could be good.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: DinoDiscoveries
Title: Unearthing the Past: Recent Fossil Discoveries Shed New Light on Prehistoric Life
Description: Dive into the world of paleontology with this fascinating look at the latest fossil discoveries. From revealing new dinosaur species to providing unprecedented insights into prehistoric ecosystems, these finds are shaping our understanding of life on Earth millions of years ago. This article offers a thrilling journey into the past, exploring both the scientific significance of these discoveries and the stories of the men and women who unearthed them.
Yes.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
